settings.text: “My body feels alive again. Thank you Deep Dive Wellness!”

settings.product_title:
Access the Benefits of Cold
Water Exposure with the
Deep Dive Cold Plunge Bath

settings.text1:
Introducing the Deep Dive Wellness plunge bath, the ultimate solution for portable and affordable cold water therapy. At just 8 lbs, it's light enough to take with you on the go, yet its small size belies its impressive capacity of up to 80 gallons of freezing water.

With a diameter of 30” and a height of 30”, it can comfortably accommodate individuals up to 6'9” in height. Say goodbye to expensive custom ice baths and the hassle of cramming yourself into a chest freezer. The Deep Dive Wellness plunge bath revolutionizes your cold water therapy experience, offering convenience, performance, and unmatched results.

BPA and Phthalate Free: We prioritize your health and well-being. The Deep Dive Wellness Plunge Bath is free from BPA and Phthalates, ensuring a safe and wholesome wellness experience.

Elevate your recovery and unleash your potential with the Deep Dive Wellness portable plunge bath.
settings.text2:
The benefits of immersing yourself in cold water are numerous and well documented. Cold water therapy has been shown to:

  1. Reduce muscle soreness and inflammation
  2. Improve circulation and boost the immune system
  3. Enhance quality of sleep for deeper rest
  4. Heighten energy levels for increased vitality
  5. Aid in recovery from physical exertion
  6. Stimulate metabolic function for weight management
  7. Elevate mood and promote mental well-being
  8. Enhance skin complexion and reduce wrinkles
  9. Enjoy numerous additional benefits for overall health and wellness and much more…

settings.answer2:
• Diameter: 75cm (30 inches)
  • Height: 75cm (30 inches)
  • Weight: 3.5 kg (8 lb)
  • Capacity: 300 L (80 GL)
  • Suitable for heights up to 2.1m (6′9 foot)

settings.answer4:
We ship Worldwide with USPS, UPS or FedEx.

See the average delivery times below:

Shipping Options:

  • Standard Shipping: Arrives in 5-7 business days (currently complimentary for a limited time).
  • Expedited Shipping: Expected delivery within 3-5 business days.
  • Priority Shipping: Anticipated delivery within 1-2 business days.

All orders are dispatched from our USA & EU Warehouse center. You will receive tracking information for your order, usually within 2-5 days after placing the order. It's important to note that we cannot guarantee delivery dates and time frames since these are subject to FedEx & USPS operations. The estimated times provided above and at checkout are based on estimates from the courier. Consequently, we are unable to issue shipping cost refunds for delayed parcels. If your parcel is delayed, we advise you to contact the respective shipping company for resolution. See shipping details.
settings.answer5:
Take advantage of our 30-day return window for any concerns. Learn more about our return and refund policy. Once we receive your returned item at our warehouse, expect your refund to be processed within 5 business days.

Please reach out to us at support@deepdivewellness.com for further inquiries.

settings.question: Here’s What to Expect
settings.answer:
Enjoy the invigorating sensation of cold water therapy as it reduces muscle soreness, improves circulation, promotes deeper sleep, boosts energy levels, reduces inflammation, improves metabolic function, enhances mood, and aids in recovery. 

Embrace the convenience, performance, and unmatched results of this portable plunge bath to elevate your well-being.

settings.question: For Athletes
settings.answer:
Unleash your potential as an athlete with the Deep Dive Wellness plunge bath. Say goodbye to post-workout muscle soreness and inflammation as you incorporate cold water therapy into your routine. 

Experience faster recovery, enhanced circulation, and improved performance. This portable solution seamlessly integrates into your training regimen, helping you stay ahead of the competition and achieve peak athletic performance.

settings.question: For Fitness Enthusiasts
settings.answer: Immerse yourself in invigorating cold water therapy that reduces muscle soreness, improves circulation, and increases energy levels. Enhance your fitness routine and accelerate your recovery with this portable and affordable solution.

settings.question: For Wellness & Health-Conscious Individuals
settings.answer: Experience reduced inflammation, improved circulation, boosted immune system, enhanced metabolism, elevated mood, and a deeper connection with your body. Incorporate this plunge bath into your wellness routine to nurture holistic well-being and embark on a transformative journey.

settings.heading: Why It’s Cool to be Cold
settings.text:
Imagine the rush of icy water against your skin, awakening every cell in your body. Cold water exposure is like a superpower, accelerating recovery, amplifying circulation, and supercharging energy levels. But it doesn't stop there – it also clears mental fog, sharpens focus, and enhances clarity. Take the plunge into the extraordinary world of cold water therapy, where Deep Dive Wellness is your ultimate companion in the quest for exhilaration and vitality.

Experience the coolness, unleash your inner adventurer, and discover the wonders that await. It's time to be cool and feel cool with Deep Dive Wellness.

settings.title: Consistency
settings.text: Make cold water therapy a regular part of your routine for optimal results. Start with shorter sessions and gradually increase the duration. Consistent exposure to cold water enhances recovery and boosts circulation.

settings.title: Breath Work
settings.text: Take slow, deliberate breaths through your nose, allowing the refreshing sensation of the water to invigorate your body, and exhale fully, releasing tension and promoting relaxation.

settings.title: Mental Fortitude
settings.text: Embrace the discomfort and challenge yourself to stay present. Cultivate a positive mindset and embrace the invigorating sensations. Cold water therapy builds mental resilience, clarity, and a sense of accomplishment.

settings.question: What is a cold plunge bath?
settings.answer: A cold plunge bath is a shallow bath filled with cold water, typically used for the practice of cold water therapy or hydrotherapy.

settings.question: What are the benefits of cold plunge bathing?
settings.answer: Cold plunge bathing has been shown to provide benefits such as reduced pain, improved circulation, reduced stress, increased mental clarity, and improved immune function.

settings.question: Can I use a cold plunge bath outdoors?
settings.answer: Yes, you can use a cold plunge bath outdoors, but it is important to protect the tub from weather elements

settings.question: What temperature should the water be for a cold plunge bath?
settings.answer: The temperature of the water for a cold plunge bath typically ranges from 50-60°F.

settings.question: How long should I stay in the cold plunge bath?
settings.answer: The length of time you should stay in the cold plunge bath will depend on your individual tolerance. It is recommended to start with short durations (1-3 minutes) and gradually increase as your body becomes accustomed to the therapy.

settings.question: What should I do after a cold plunge bath?
settings.answer: After a cold plunge bath, it is recommended to warm up gradually by showering with warm water or covering yourself with warm blankets. It is also recommended to drink plenty of water to replace fluids lost during the therapy.

settings.question: What should I wear during a cold plunge bath?
settings.answer: It is recommended to wear a swimsuit or other appropriate clothing during a cold plunge bath.

settings.question: Can I use a cold plunge bath if I have sensitive skin?
settings.answer: Cold water therapy may not be appropriate for individuals with sensitive skin. It is always best to consult with a healthcare professional to determine if this therapy is right for you.

settings.question: How do I maintain my cold plunge bath?
settings.answer: It is important to keep your cold plunge bath clean and well-maintained to ensure the best possible experience and to prevent the growth of harmful bacteria. Regular cleaning and proper storage can help extend the life of your tub.

settings.question: Can I use a cold plunge bath outdoors?
settings.answer: Yes, you can use a cold plunge bath outdoors, but it is important to protect the tub from weather elements
